EmailTemplate.subject: Join us Allhere at Enterprise Connect 2019!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Join us in being Allwhere at EC 2019! We are on the cusp of a new industrial revolution that promises to unlock massive economic and productivity gains and set us on course for a new era of tremendous transformation and progress! Industry 4.0 technologies — IoT, IoMT, edge computing, deep analytics based on artificial intelligence and machine learning, ubiquitous networking, augmented and virtual reality, and more — are here or very soon will be! Nokia calls this vision Allwhere. Please join us at Enterprise Connect in Orlando, Florida, Booth 1227 from March 18-21 to see how Allwhere can help you transform your Enterprise. Nokia will be discussing how our portfolio can help you reap the advantages of this revolution! We will feature thought-provoking demonstrations that bring the Allwhere vision to reality including:
- Delivering healthcare in real time - Leapfrogging voice security not only to best of breed but also to the cloud - Leveraging the latest computer technology advances to battle even the most sophisticated security threats using AI, machine learning and multi-dimensional analytics - Upgrading to an enterprise LAN that can support this vision.
Nokia’s own Kelsyn Rooks will also be part of a panel discussing “What You’ll Wish You Knew About 5G” on Thursday, March 21, from 9-10 AM. We look forward to seeing you! Nokia has full function demonstrations so you can see for yourself! Enterprise Networking for Smart Healthcare: Discover the breadth and scope of software-defined networking and its importance for the next big steps in the delivery of real-time healthcare.
Hyper-agile session border control: Demo includes the challenges large enterprises face, how they are addressed by a cloud-native SBC, and the resulting competitive advantages.
Digital trust for Enterprises: We demonstrate how enterprises can be more proactive, predictive and automated by leveraging Artificial Intelligence, Cognitive and Multi-dimensional Analytics, Machine learning and Threat Intelligence.
Bring your LAN to lightspeed: We demonstrate how Optical LAN is far more powerful and at a fraction of complexity, space, energy & cost of a legacy LAN. © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[https://{{my.emailContactUs}}]]> | Privacy <[[https://{{my.emailPrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/nokiaindustries]]>
